author: becka11y
msg: integrated pull request from Charles Chan to include additional targetWidth and targetHeight options and implement scaling the returned image to specified size.  Documented the getPicture() options in camera.js.  Did not implement support for selecting image type as it is not available on other platforms.

author: becka11y
msg: Update to Contacts spec of June, 2001

Removed some fields from Contact and ContactOrganization.  Added type and pref to ContactAddress and ContactOrganiztion . Type is supported for ContactAddress, pref is not supported for either.  Return empty array (rather than error) when no contacts found in find. Added support for fields = ["*"] to return all field information. Modified code to return some value if displayName requested and there is no other name information.
